code: import React from'react';import{Shield,CheckCircle}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SecurityBadges=()=>{const badges=[{icon:Shield,title:'RBI Compliant',description:'Regulated by Reserve Bank of India'},{icon:CheckCircle,title:'NPCI Certified',description:'UPI payments via NPCI network'},{icon:Shield,title:'PCI DSS',description:'Secure card data handling'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"glassmorphic rounded-2xl p-6 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4",children:"Security & Compliance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:badges.map((badge,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-white/50 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-8 h-8 bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/10 to-primary/5 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(badge.icon,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-primary",strokeWidth:1.5})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-medium text-gray-900 text-sm",children:badge.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xs text-gray-600",children:badge.description})]})]},index))})]});};export default SecurityBadges;
